entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @GavinNewsom Good afternoon Mr @GavinNewsom  today I am reaching out in frustration and pray and ask that you help me. I have been furloughed from my job since March 17th due to the coronavirus pandemic. I have done everything my job has told me to do in regards to filling for unemployment!
